title: Ticket #5797: condor_status -format ignores literals after %60s format specs
description:
condor_status -format "%s foo" Machine -format " bar\n" Machine

correctly emits 

machine_name foo bar

but

condor_status -format "%40s foo" Machine -format " bar\n" Machine

skips the foo, and only emits 

      machine_name bar
creator: gthain
